channel.title: RuneMatter 317 | Creativity Is The Key [ HIRING WEBDEVELOPER ]
channel.description:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/63uhoy.png[/img]
[b]Welcome to RuneMatter.[/b] Our goal is to be one of the uniquest/creativest servers out here in the RSPS community. We want to make this server nearly perfect so there is more fun, Custom minigames and alot more. With perfectly we doesn't mean only the combat but everything. We using Project insanity as base and we will recode it into a great server. This project would take some time, but we will keep this thread updated. And the biggest part of our server is to make fun and learn something.
[b][i]Development Team[/i][/b]
[b]Java Programmers[/b] - I Hybrid I - Fails - Kodiak
[b]Inactive Java Programmers / Community Manager(s)[/b] - Dwarfs222
[b]Graphic Artists[/b] - I Hybrid I
[b]Website Developer / Administrator[/b] - None yet (Hiring one)
Our ToDo list for now; • New Home • Herblore • Realistic economy • Clipped NPC following! • Custom shops • Progress video's • Fishing Guild • (Custom) range Guild • crafting Guild • cooking Guild • donator zone • Combat Guild in Combat training camp • Blurite dungeon (Frost Dragons!) • Clan Wars • Castle Wars
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/13yjadt.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qthagp.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/15ex1kg.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/9hkj69.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/db3sw.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/sl4gi8.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/p0ikh.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2a9biaf.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/30207eu.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/rw4c9x.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/33kf6vc.png[/img]
UPDATES WE'VE DONE TODAY!: - Added one big portal to him which goes to donator zone (Might remove this not sure) - Added an item box which gives you full rogue when you reached 99 Crafting! - Added that when you wear full rogue that you will get x2 thieving points. - Added milking :P
[code] Msn; Skype; What position do you want? (Java Programmer, Gfx Artist, Tester): On a scale of 1-10 how experienced are you at programing PI? Ignore if not applying for this position. What time zone: How many hours a day/weekend?; Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: [/code]

item.title: RuneMatter 317 | Creativity Is The Key [ HIRING WEBDEVELOPER ]
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

EverMorePK:

I see lot’s of potential in this. I say good luck.

I’m sorry, this project is dead.
We have a new project (without I_Hybrid_I).
Watch my signature for the website.

Read full topic

Any Suggestions?: Not Really No… I’ll See

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,564369.0.html
[/quote]
If you want to install it for us? Sure.[/quote]

It comes with an installer. All you have to do is upload it, then install it.

If you need help, add my skype: srbuckey5266

item.title: RuneMatter 317 | Creativity Is The Key [ HIRING WEBDEVELOPER ]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:42, topic:459796”][quote author=I_Hybrid_I link=topic=562698.msg4109118#msg4109118 date=1348352925]

Msn;mbec4@hotmail.co.uk
Skype;Dclawed.(full stop at the end, I use this more)
What position do you want? (Java Programmer, Gfx Artist, Tester): Admin, I can help with website as well, I have been helping out on another site too, if you want to see my work I can show
On a scale of 1-10 how experienced are you at programing PI? Ignore if not applying for this position.
What time zone:GMT +0
How many hours a day/weekend?; day= around 2/3, and weekend 4/5hrs.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I am helpful, I think I deserve this job.
Any Suggestions?: Nope, but your website will look great.

Show your work

Should I accept him?
[/quote]

Possibly. Iirc he posted a lot of leeched java work a while back so I just wanted to make sure this wasn’t leeched lol.[/quote]
Lol.
A few Programmers of the team left, Im looking for loyal programmers to do this with me
So apply!

Read full topic
